#### Project Overview

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) invites contractors to conduct a lobster abundance and condition monitoring study at the Black Point Disposal Site, located in New Brunswick. The study aims to assess the impact of permitted disposal activities on lobster populations.

Key objectives include:

* Collection and processing of live and intact lobsters for tissue analysis
* Monitoring of depth and temperature at the study area
* Photography and sediment sampling to characterize each study area
